skills.name: DISMANTLE
desc: • Deals physical damage to a single target.
• Disable the Passive of the enemy for 2 turns.
• 65% Chance to Stun the target for 1 turn if they are suffering from Decreased Max HP effects.

skills.name: MASS DESTRUCTION
desc: • Deals physical damage to all enemies.
• Decrease the Max HP of all enemies by 20%.
• Inflict Ignite on all enemies for 2 turns.

skills.name: ROLLING FURY
desc: Generate Fury when you take damage. 20% Chance to gain an Extra Turn after each action.
